# `ditwahLandslide`

This package provides curated early-warning data on landslides in Sri Lanka during the Ditwah storm, scraped from the Disaster Management Centre, Sri Lanka. It includes a structured, machine-readable, analysis-ready tidy dataset designed to support statistical workflows, education, and research.

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

![](https://github.com/thiyangt/ditwahLandslide/blob/main/data-raw/flyr.png?raw=true)

## Installation

You can install the development version of ditwahLandslide from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("pak")
pak::pak("thiyangt/ditwahLandslide")
```

## Example



```{r example}
library(ditwahLandslide)
head(ditwah_landslides_warnings)
```
